name: Food Flinger VR
description:
(This is an apk file to sideload onto your Oculus Quest)

The patrons are hungry, so feed them!

Huck food at their faces to shut them up graciously serve them... in VR!  Grab their tips, prep for the next wave, and do it all over again!  Can you survive to Wave 99?

Food Flingin' Fun!
  • An Oculus Quest VR arcade game.
  • Randomized patron preferences means lots of replayability.
  • Arcade mechanics - Wait till they're on the Sweet Spot to increase your coinage (and points!).
  • Puts the 'fun' back in 'Virtual Reality is fun'!
Credits:
  • Programming, Design - Eric Guadara
  • Producer - Brian Olson
  • Music - Ricardo Cuello
    • https://rest--vgmusic.bandcamp.com/
    • https://richarrest.itch.io/classic-jrpg-music-pack-medium-pack
  • Cover Art Font - Chris Garrett - cgf_locust_resistance
